message: fixed site publication issue (NPE on m-enforcer-p)

file.patch:
@@ -304,6 +304,17 @@ under the License.
           </execution>
         </executions>
       </plugin>
+      <plugin><!-- TODO remove when upgrading to parent pom 31 -->
+        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+        <artifactId>maven-enforcer-plugin</artifactId>

+            <version>1.0-beta-6</version>
+          </dependency>
+        </dependencies>
+      </plugin>
     </plugins>
   </build>

message:
[DOXIA-537] NullPointerException parsing table cell with single space

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/maven/doxia/doxia/trunk@1726441 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -300,6 +300,21 @@ public void testLink()
         assertEquals( 9, result.split( "end:link
" ).length );
     }
 
+    public void testTable()
+        throws Exception
+    {
+        String result = locateAndParseTestSourceFile( "table" );
+        
+        // DOXIA-537
+        // |1|2|3|
+        assertContainsLines( result, "begin:tableRow
begin:tableCell
text: 1
end:tableCell


begin:tableCell
text: 2
end:tableCell


begin:tableCell
text: 3
end:tableCell
" );
+        // |1||3|
+        assertContainsLines( result, "begin:tableRow
begin:tableCell
text: 1
end:tableCell


begin:tableCell
text: 3
end:tableCell
" );
+        // |1| |3|
+        assertContainsLines( result, "begin:tableRow
begin:tableCell
text: 1
end:tableCell


begin:tableCell
text:  
end:tableCell


begin:tableCell
text: 3
end:tableCell
" );
+        
+    }
+
     /** @throws Exception */
     public void testTableWithLinks()
         throws Exception

@@ -10,4 +10,19 @@ Table with links (DOXIA-301):
 || Version || Download || Date || Format || 
 |0.1.1 | [Download|http://example.com/release.0.1.1/ex-win32-win32.x86.zip] | 12-12-2008 | zip |
 |0.1.2 | [Download|http://example.com/release.0.1.2/ex-win32-win32.x86.zip] | 04-12-2008 | zip |
-|0.1.3 | [Download|http://example.com/release.0.1.3/ex-win32-win32.x86.zip] | 03-11-2008 | zip |
\ No newline at end of file
+|0.1.3 | [Download|http://example.com/release.0.1.3/ex-win32-win32.x86.zip] | 03-11-2008 | zip |
+
+Here is a 3 column table with headers, one row, and data in every column:
+ 
+||One||Two||Three||
+|1|2|3|
+ 
+Now there is no data in column Two
+ 
+||One||Two||Three||
+|1||3|
+ 
+Now there is a space in column Two
+ 
+||One||Two||Three||
+|1| |3|
\ No newline at end of file

message:

message:
DOXIA-240: NPE when building documentation

o moved the init of macroParameters to the <macro/> tag init

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/maven/doxia/doxia/trunk@656475 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix some problems in SinkEventAttributeSet:
 o make it Cloneable
 o add a method to make it unmodifiable
 o make all static fields unmodifiable
 o add attribute values as Objects, not Strings
 o fix potential NPEs in clone() and hashCode()

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/maven/doxia/doxia/trunk@759584 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[DOXIA-221] Fix NPE when the celljustif array is shorter than the cell count.
            Switch to left default justification in XhtmlBaseParser.
Submitted by: Benjamin Bentmann

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/maven/doxia/doxia/trunk@628439 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
